name: Dungeon of Kursfest
description:
Made for Godot Wild Jam #54, theme "curses"

Puzzle game in which you collect treasures and get hit by curses.

Sprites : https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack (modified)
Sounds : https://freesound.org
Music : https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Strobotone/game-and-broadcast-music/medieval-...
Font : https://www.fontspace.com/dungeon-quests-font-f88433
